metadata.name: KANDOR
metadata.description:
A mage of unrivaled power and a countless number of destruction and mayhem to his name. Yes, he isn't one of the good guys. 

Kandor seeks to enslave the magic realm and replace humans with gargoyles, his favourite. He's amassed power from all the dragons he has slain, powerful magic that would enable him bring in unspeakable creatures from the Netherrealm. 

This is not a story with a happy ending. Kandor is simply too powerful to be defeated, he even tamed death.
